Request.Command:
date whoami hostname setenv HERE $PWD
setenv JLAB_ROOT /site/12gev_phys source $JLAB_ROOT/ce/jlab.csh setenv MYSQLPP_LIB_DIR $HOME/svn/lib setenv MYSQLPP_INC_DIR $HOME/svn/include/mysql++
setenv QWANALYSIS /u/home/narayan/svn/QwAnalysis setenv QWSCRATCH /w/hallc/compton/users/narayan/my_scratch source /u/home/narayan/svn/QwAnalysis/SetupFiles/SET_ME_UP.csh setenv QW_DATA /cache/mss/hallc/qweak/polarimetry/raw setenv SVNSCRIPT /u/home/narayan/svn/QwAnalysis/Extensions/Macros/Compton/edetLasCyc
cd $SVNSCRIPT../edetHelLC setenv QW_ROOTFILES $HERE root -l -b -q edetLasCyc.C+\(RUNNUM\)
